channel.title: bcd-watch rss feed
channel.description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Fri Jan 26 2024 06:02:28 GMT-0500 (Eastern Standard Time) - Tue Jan 30 2024 11:03:39 GMT-0500 (Eastern Standard Time)
item.description: Weekly summary of changes to BCD data
item.content:encoded:
